thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 10 of 537
thread.title: Laura Risinger

author: Laura Risinger
title: Laura Risinger
text: I got an amazing price on my contacts from Opti contacts. Delivery took about 1.5 weeks. This is long considering I paid for the next day shipping option. I would like a heads up in the future if my contacts are not actually in stock and will be back ordered. This would give me the option to look elsewhere to get my contacts sooner. Otherwise great customer service and excellent prices!
